price: われら*は昔の人々に、どれだけ多くの預言者*を遣わしたことか。
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
